title: The Curious Caterpillar
hook: Join Fredrick the caterpillar on an adventure to discover his unique talent. What could it be?
moral: Embrace your quirks and talents, as they make you special.
paragraphs: Once upon a time in a whimsical garden, there lived a curious little caterpillar named Fredrick. While all his friends were munching on leaves, Fredrick loved to explore every nook and cranny of the garden.

One sunny day, Fredrick stumbled upon a group of ants marching in a perfectly straight line. "Hello, friends! What are you doing?" asked Fredrick, his tiny voice filled with wonder. The ants replied, "We are following a trail to collect food. It's our specialty!"
Fredrick felt a little sad that he didn't have a special talent like the ants. However, that night, as he spun himself into a cozy cocoon, it hit him - his talent was waiting to bloom.

After a few days, Fredrick emerged from his cocoon with vibrant wings! He fluttered around the garden, spreading joy with his colorful patterns. All his friends were amazed by his unique talent, and Fredrick learned that being different was what made him truly special.

en-pt.title: A Lagarta Curiosa
en-pt.moral: Abraça tuas coisas diferentes e habilidades, porque elas te tornam único.
en-pt.hook: Vamos com Fredrick a lagartinha em uma aventura para descobrir o talento único dele. O que será?
paragraphs:
Era uma vez em um jardim mágico, morava uma lagarta curiosa chamada Frederico. Enquanto todos os seus amigos comiam folhas, Frederico adorava explorar cada cantinho do jardim.
Num dia ensolarado, Fredrick tropeçou em um grupo de formigas marchando em uma linha reta perfeita. "Olá, amigos! O que vocês estão fazendo?" perguntou Fredrick, sua vozinha cheia de fascínio. As formigas responderam, "Estamos seguindo uma trilha para coletar comida. É nossa especialidade!"
Fredrick estava um pouquinho triste por não ter um talento especial como as formigas. Mas, naquela noite, enquanto se enrolava em um casulo aconchegante, ele percebeu - seu talento estava esperando para florescer.
Depois de alguns dias, Fredrick saiu de seu casulo com asas vibrantes! Ele voou pelo jardim, espalhando alegria com suas cores brilhantes. Todos os seus amigos ficaram maravilhados com seu talento único, e Fredrick descobriu que ser diferente era o que o fazia realmente especial.

id-en.hook: Join Fredrick the caterpillar on an adventure to discover his unique talent. What could it be?
id-en.moral: Embrace your quirks and talents, as they make you special.
id-en.title: The Curious Caterpillar
paragraphs:
Long ago in a magical garden, there was a very curious little caterpillar named Fredrick. While his friends ate leaves, Fredrick enjoyed exploring the tiny corners of the garden.
One day, under the warm sun, Fredrick met a line of ants walking very straight. "Hi, friends! What are you doing?" Fredrick asked with lots of interest in his small voice. The ants said, "We're following a path to get food. That's what we do best!"
Fredrick felt a bit upset because he couldn't do something amazing like the ants. But that night, when he wrapped himself in a comfy cocoon, he realized - his special skill was about to blossom.
One day, Fredrick, who was like a sleepy bug before, picked out of his soft shell with brightly colored wings! He danced all around the garden, making everyone happy with his beautiful designs. His friends were so surprised by his clever skills, and Fredrick discovered that not being the same as others made him really extraordinary.

en-fr.title: La Chenille Curieuse
en-fr.hook: Viens avec Fredrick la chenille dans une aventure pour découvrir son talent unique. Qu'est-ce que ça pourrait être?
en-fr.moral: Sois fier de tes particularités et de tes talents, car c'est ce qui te rend spécial.
paragraphs:
Il était une fois dans un jardin magique, habitait une petite chenille curieuse nommée Fredrick. Alors que tous ses amis mangeaient des feuilles, Fredrick adorait explorer chaque recoin du jardin.
Un jour ensoleillé, Fredrick a rencontré un groupe de fourmis marchant dans une ligne parfaitement droite. "Bonjour, amis! Que faites-vous?" demanda Fredrick, sa petite voix remplie d'émerveillement. Les fourmis répondirent, "Nous suivons un chemin pour collecter de la nourriture. C'est notre spécialité!"
Fredrick se sentait un peu triste de ne pas avoir un talent spécial comme les fourmis. Mais, cette nuit-là, alors qu'il se tournait dans un cocon douillet, il comprit - son talent n'attendait qu'à éclore.
Après quelques jours, Fredrick est sorti de son cocon avec des ailes colorées ! Il a voltigé autour du jardin, apportant de la joie avec ses motifs colorés. Tous ses amis étaient étonnés par son talent unique, et Fredrick a appris que être différent était ce qui le rendait vraiment spécial.

en-de.title: Der Neugierige Raupen
en-de.moral: Umarme deine Besonderheiten und Talente, denn sie machen dich besonders.
en-de.hook: Komm mit Fredrick der Raupe auf ein Abenteuer, um sein besonderes Talent zu entdecken. Was könnte es sein?
paragraphs:
Es war einmal in einem märchenhaften Garten, wo ein neugieriger kleine Raupe namens Fredrick wohnte. Während all seine Freunde an Blättern knabberten, erforschte Fredrick gerne jede Ecke und jeden Winkel des Gartens.
Eines sonnigen Tages stolperte Frederick über eine Gruppe Ameisen, die in einer perfekt geraden Linie marschierten. "Hallo, Freunde! Was macht ihr?" fragte Frederick, seine winzige Stimme voller Staunen. Die Ameisen antworteten: "Wir folgen einem Weg, um Nahrung zu sammeln. Das ist unsere Spezialität!"
Fredrick fühlte sich ein bisschen traurig, dass er kein besonderes Talent wie die Ameisen hatte. Aber in dieser Nacht, als er sich in einen gemütlichen Kokon einwickelte, wurde ihm klar - sein Talent wartete darauf zu erblühen.
Nach ein paar Tagen kroch Fredrick aus seinem Kokon mit lebendigen Flügeln! Er flatterte im Garten herum und verbreitete Freude mit seinen bunten Mustern. Alle seine Freunde waren von seinem einzigartigen Talent erstaunt, und Fredrick merkte, dass es ihn wirklich besonders machte, verschieden zu sein.
